cat_seo_title: Maxline Power Strip Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech

full_description:
Maxline ML-804 USB Fast Charging Multiplug Power Strip

The Maxline ML-804 USB Fast Charging Multiplug Power Strip is a versatile and reliable device capable of charging numerous devices at the same time. It has three power sockets that can handle up to 2500 watts, making it appropriate for most appliances and electronics. The power strip also contains four USB ports, one of which is USB-C and one is USB-A, both of which enable fast charging protocols such as PD3.0 and QC3.0. The Maxline ML-804 USB Fast Charging Multiplug Power Strip offers a 100–250V universal input voltage, allowing it to work in many nations and regions without the use of adapters. Its 2M cord is long and sturdy, allowing you to place the power strip anywhere you need it. When using the USB ports, the power strip can produce a maximum output of 38 watts. The Maxline ML-804 USB Fast Charging Multiplug Power Strip's smart chip detects optimal current and voltage for each device, ensuring a fast and safe charging experience.

3 Sockets and 4 USB Ports

The Maxline ML-804 USB Fast Charging Multiplug Power Strip contains three outlets that can handle up to 2500W of electricity, which is plenty for most appliances and electronics. The power strip also contains four USB ports, one of which is USB-C and one is USB-A, both of which enable fast charging protocols such as PD3.0 and QC3.0. The USB ports allow you to swiftly and safely charge your cellphones, tablets, laptops, and other devices.

100-250V Input and 2M Cable

The power strip has a universal input voltage of 100-250V, so it can be used in a variety of nations and regions without the use of adapters. The power strip also has a 2M long and robust cord, giving you greater freedom and convenience in positioning the power strip where you need it.

38W Max Output and Smart Chip

When using the USB ports, the Maxline ML-804 USB Fast Charging Multiplug Power Strip can provide a maximum output of 38W, which is sufficient for most devices. The power strip also has a smart chip that can identify the appropriate current and voltage for each device and alter the output accordingly. This offers a quick and safe charging experience for your electronic devices.
